div.p:
Plasmodium
parasitaemia. Parasitaemia (with standard error) of the two most prevalent Plasmodium lineages - SGS1 (Plasmodium relictum, n = 83) and SW2 (Plasmodium polare, n = 9). Individuals infected with SW2 showed higher parasitaemia than individuals infected with SGS1 (t (13.17)=âˆ’2.84, p <0.05).
